CAPTION FIGNA.png: 'Frequency of cognitive support for analogies. Teachers reinforced a percentage of their analogies (bars) by providing cognitive supports (labeled A through F\\({}_{r}\\) defined in the text). Supports were provided less frequently by U.S. teachers (red) than by teachers from Heng Kong (green) or Japan (orange). Error bars represent standard error per country per support code.\n\n'
